short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your security by auto-hiding sensitive information on AWS Management Console.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browsing AWS Management Console just got safer and less stressful with AWS Masking!
This simple extension smoothly blurs out important bits of information like:
・Account ID
・ARN (Amazon Resource Name)
・Access Key ID
・Secret Access Key
Now, share your screen or snap a screenshot without fears of revealing too much.

Add AWS Masking to your browser today, and enjoy a worry-free AWS experience!

GitHub: https://github.com/koki-develop/aws-masking
